text: The 2020 NCAA Division I men's basketball tournament was a planned single- elimination college basketball tournament. There were planned to be 68 teams in it. The tournament was for National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I men's college basketball. The winner would have been the national champion for the 2019â€“20 college basketball season. The tournament was scheduled to start on March 17, 2020. It would have ended on April 6. The championship game was not held due to the cancellation of the entire tournament.
title: 2020 NCAA Division I men's basketball tournament
